Title: The Story of Toby's New House
Plot: Cartoon series about Lucy, who lives next door to a zoo and every night is told a story by the animals. When the animals on the savannah spring clean and redecorate their homes, Toby the Tortoise gets upset as there isn't much he can do to his shell. He soon realises that perhaps his old shell was perfect after all.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
